scripts.prepare:socotra: mustache config/juneo-socotra.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.deploy:socotra: npm run prepare:socotra && graph deploy Socotra8BitSwapBlocks
scripts.prepare:june: mustache config/juneo-june.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.deploy:june: npm run prepare:june && graph deploy June8BitSwapBlocks
